title: What will happen to the satellite annexation by the city near Marsh Oaks given the recent annexation legislation passed in Raleigh?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20120503/ARTICLES/120509834?p=all&tc=pgall Goolsby has not so far submitted a new bill to outlaw spot annexation.
